sense.name: Expel gas, light, heat, vapor, or some other natural product from an entity.
sense.examples: Distant solar systems emitted light billions of years ago, rays that we're just now seeing. The ozone blocks some of the harmful rays that the sun emits. John emits a foul odor. Certain elements emit radiation.

sense.name: Express audibly; utter sounds (not necessarily words); indicate.
sense.commentary: Syntax Includes: NP1[agent] EMIT NP2[proposition] NP1[topic] EMIT NP2[proposition]
sense.examples: She emitted a big heavy sigh. Stocks emitted ominous signals today. He emitted strange sounds that nobody could understand.
